summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6221 for the improvement of 32nd Ave. South from Beacon Ave. to Myrtle Place; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88750, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
